name: FroggMan
description:
Hello! I'm Andrea Di Bartolo( SirAeron on twitch) 3d Artist for StrangeFire Games (Shoppe Keep, Shoppe Keep2, Craft Keep:Vr, first time that i partecipate in a 8 bit to infinity jam! I'm a 3D Artist who does code only in his free-time and for gamejams, i did everything by myself for this game except for the Audio.

Froggman is a very simple Pac-Man-like game, but, with Frogger-inspired graphics! in this game you will play as Froggman trying to collect all the crystals in the valley, but be ware, evil cars will try to get you, try to escape them!

Fun fact: all the game 3d graphics are done using just 1 texture!

this one:

3D Art/Code/Ui/Game design - Andrea Di Bartolo
Music Track: Dark Moon by Mr.Joshua McLean (2019 mrjoshuamclean.com)

Sound Effects from Freesound.org
